name: Raf R's Operation Application art Machine - Fractal Generator
name_original: Raf R's Operation Application art Machine - Fractal Generator
description:
Change variables with your sliders to create pretty  pieces. drag sliders with your mouse to change your equation, them press space to draw watch your piece bloom.  save (right click in canvas), change timescale to reverse or speed up and find pretty moments in your ever changing piece. press z to get a seed, copy it, press x to load, paste it, and see your favorite pieces load right back up to reanimate and toggle in real time. try new slider positions each time and you are sure to find a mesmerizing seed.

full download of all three machines containing instructions can be found here - https://mr-slitherz.itch.io/raf-rs-operation-aplication-art-machines
